contentrichtext.text: {{wiktionary|Cornish}} '''Cornish''' is the adjective and demonym associated with [[Cornwall]], the most southwesterly part of the United Kingdom. It may refer to: {{TOC right}} * The [[Cornish language]] * The [[Cornish people]] ** [[Cornish American]] ** [[Cornish Australian]] ** [[Cornish diaspora]] * of or relating to the [[culture of Cornwall]] * [[Cornish Pirates]], a rugby union team ==People== * [[Cornish (surname)]] ==Animals== * [[Cornish (chicken)]], a breed of chicken * [[Cornish Rex]], a breed of cat ==Places and institutions== ===United States=== * [[Cornish, Maine]] * [[Cornish Township, Aitkin County, Minnesota]] * [[Cornish Township, Sibley County, Minnesota]] * [[Cornish, New Hampshire]] * [[Cornish, Oklahoma]] * [[Cornish, Utah]] * [[Cornish College of the Arts]], an institution in Seattle, Washington ==Other uses== * ''[[The Cornish Trilogy]]'', three related novels by Canadian novelist Robertson Davies * [[Cornish pilot gig]], a type of rowing boat ==See also== * [[Kornis]], a family of [[Nobility in the Kingdom of Hungary]] * [[List of topics related to Cornwall]] {{disambiguation|geo}}
